answers.answer: Well the good part is at least your like this at the end and not at the beginning. That would be serious weight gaining then lol
Lol I would crave huge brownies with walnuts from the chocolate factory which is right next to my job. I literally  would eat one a day
I'm 35 weeks and I canot stop eating I feel hungry all the time I'm just worried about how big my little gurl gana be....
I went Wednesday for my 36*3 sono and my son was weighing in at 6 lbs
Sane here I'm 38 weeks and all I want to do is , two weeks ago my Doctor gave me an estimate that my baby girl weight was about 7 pounds lol I'm so nervous on how big , she's going to be .

Same here im only 14 weeks and im always hungry. I dont have an appetite i dont really have cravings either but always hungry. Im nervous to gain more weight as it is i was already over weight before pregnancy.lol good luck to you.
In only 5 weeks and I'm always hungry! I don't have any cravings it can be any food. So I'm trying to eat as healthy as possible.
I am eating as I write this. Lol hopefully a slice of bread and milk will help me feel full so I can sleep. Im 7 weeks 3 days.
Even if you pack on the pounds, your baby will only take what he or she needs. Babies aren't gluttons. Except in the case of gestational diabetes.

question: 37 wks and I still eat like crazy lol I just ate  practically  the whole tub of butter pecan ice cream... it's like I just want to stuff my face every  10-15 mins....
title: I can't stop eating  lol
